name: online-voting-backend
description:
## How To run * Download pgadmin version 13.2 from `https://www.enterprisedb.com/downloads/postgres-postgresql-downloads`
* Run It * Make a new server
### server config `Name : localhost`
`Host name/addr : 127.0.0.1`
`Port : 5433`
`Password : password`
HIT SAVE
